name: Storage Inc 2
description: Fun cooperative game for 1-4 players. Each player controls a forklift truck in a warehouse. As new goods keeps arriving, the players must work together organizing them, so that they can make the outgoing deliveries as needed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (or higher) Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 4 compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 70 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard or Xbox 360 compatible gamepad supported. Shared Screen coop requires one gamepad per player.
